title: Meditation Aromatherapy Mist
description: Hand crafted pure natural beeswax candles available in many unique styles
cleaned_text: Restore your surroundings with the calming, woodsy blend of Cedarwood, Copaiba Balsam, Ho Wood and Lavender essential oils which promote a clear mind and inner peace. Grounding Cedarwood, combined with sweet and softening Copaiba Balsam, brings a sense of peace and focus with every spray. The addition of Ho Wood and Lavender incorporate floral elements and promote comfort and deep relaxation. For best results, spritz throughout any room, directly on your body, or over fresh linens. Product Details - Ingredients: Purified Water, Pure Essential Oils of Copaiba Balsam, Cedarwood, Ho Wood and Lavender, Vegetable Glycerin. - Comes in a 4 fluid oz. aluminum bottle. - Safety: May cause skin irritation. Always test for sensitivity. For aromatic or topical use only.
